Class Citizen

java.lang.Object
Citizen
public class Citizen
extends java.lang.Object
The class Citizen represents the citizen information needed.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.util.ArrayList<VisitRecord> visitRecord
    Establishment visit record of the person

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Citizen​(User user, Personal personal)
    This constructor initializes the user information and personal information of the citizen.
    Citizen​(User user, Personal personal, int role)
    This constructor initializes the user information and personal information of the citizen.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void checkIn​(java.lang.String estCode, Date date, int time)
    This method adds the establishment visited by the citizen.

    This method returns the notice of the citizen

    This method returns the notice information

    This method returns the personal information (name, birth date and contact information) of the user.

    This method returns the role of the user.

    This method returns the user information (username and password) of the user.

    This method sets the notice to true if the user received a notice from a contact tracer.

    This method sets the role of the user into a "citizen".

  • Field Details

    • visitRecord

      public java.util.ArrayList<VisitRecord> visitRecord
      Establishment visit record of the person

  • Constructor Details

    • Citizen

      public Citizen​(User user, Personal personal)
      This constructor initializes the user information and personal information of the citizen. This sets the default role of the user to "citizen".
      Parameters:
      user - is the username and password of the user
      personal - is the name, birth date and contact information of the user

    • Citizen

      public Citizen​(User user, Personal personal, int role)
      This constructor initializes the user information and personal information of the citizen.
      Parameters:
      user - is the username and password of the user
      personal - is the name, birth date and contact information of the user
      role - is the role of the user (2 for government official and 3 for contact tracer)

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      This method returns the user information (username and password) of the user.
      Returns:
      user information needed to log in

    • getPersonal

      public Personal getPersonal()
      This method returns the personal information (name, birth date and contact information) of the user.
      Returns:
      personal information of the user

    • setRole

      public void setRole​(java.lang.String role)
      This method sets the role of the user.
      Parameters:
      role - of the citizen

    • getRole

      public java.lang.String getRole()
      This method returns the role of the user.
      Returns:
      role of the user

    • removeRole

      public void removeRole()
      This method sets the role of the user into a "citizen".

    • isInformed

      public void isInformed()
      This method sets the notice to true if the user received a notice from a contact tracer.

    • getNotice

      public boolean getNotice()
      This method returns the notice of the citizen
      Returns:
      notice either true or false

    • checkIn

      public void checkIn​(java.lang.String estCode, Date date, int time)
      This method adds the establishment visited by the citizen.
      Parameters:
      estCode - is the establishment code
      date - of the visited establishment
      time - visited the establishment code

    • reportPositive

      public void reportPositive​(java.util.ArrayList<Case> cases, Date reportDate)
      This method reports the positive cases.
      Parameters:
      cases - list of cases
      reportDate - date reported

    • getNoticeInfo

      public Notice getNoticeInfo()
      This method returns the notice information
      Returns:
      notice
